title: 怎么让玩家打不出颜色字体啊，包括牌子，跪求了！
author: 387800305@qq.co

replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp builder essentials.chat.color    #取消builder组彩色代码聊天的权限
/mangdelp default essentials.chat.color    #取消default组彩色代码聊天权限
默认用户组default

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp 组 -权限节点

权限节点:
essentials.msg.color
essentials.chat.color
essentials.signs.color
